name: Jetblue's FIRST FLIGHT Amsterdam - JFK (+ luxury Mint Studio Review)
description:
Flying the inaugural Amsterdam to New York-JFK was an incredible experience! Follow me as I fly my favourite American carrier on their first flight from the Netherlands in the luxurious Mint Studio. (AD) Click here https://bit.ly/PAULLUCAS60 to get 60% OFF your first box + 25% off your next 8 boxes, or use my code PAULLUCAS60. 

I'm so excited to share this video with you; I loved my second long haul JetBlue flight and can't wait to share more of my round the world (westbound!) trip. We've got a trip on Breeze, distinguished Japanese budget carrier ZipAir, some fabulous Japanese trains, a strange JAL A350 domestic first class product, Thai jungle trains, a 747-400 still in passenger service, what else? Oh, Qatar Airways A380 economy and a couple of other surprises along the way! make sure yiu subscribe!

Follow me on Twitter: @paul_winginit ¬¶ https://twitter.com/paul_winginit
Follow me on Instagram/Threads: paul_winginit ¬¶ https://www.instagram.com/paul_winginit

0:35 AMS Airport
1:41 At the gate - and how I booked this flight!
2:46 Hello Fresh sponsor segment
4:10 gate party, and boarding our Jetblue A321LR
6:27 Taxi and takeoff
7:36 Studio suite details
10:11 Lunch service
11:16 More wow
11:52 Amenities and goodies
12:24 IFE
13:30 Bed time (it's huge)
13:49 Second meal
14:44 Landing and conclusions

My website: www.winginit.me

Date of Travel: 30 AUGUST 2023
Airline: JetBlue
Livery: JetBlue standard livery w/Streamers tail
Route: AMS-JFK *inaugural
Aircraft: Airbus A321LR
Flight Number: B6 2289
Miles: 3,634
Airborne time: 8h29m

Stock footage provided under licence from Shutterstock.
